article.mainText: Things got very rowdy on CNN, with the guests unable to control their passions for the subject at hand. It got so out of control that it forced host Alisyn Camerota to pull the plug on her guests. Somehow, to no one’s surprise, Donald Trump’s name got dragged into the argument. See the video and read the article. As Written By Christian Daytok for Daily Caller: Cleveland’s Pastor James Davis and Atlanta Mayor Kasim Reed yelled at each other for more than a minute straight on CNN’s Thursday broadcast of “New Day,” forcing host Alisyn Camerota to pull the plug on the segment.
